Warlord’s Formation

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, Int 17, warlord
Benefit: When you use the aid another, aid attack, or aid defense action, you can target up to two allies with that action.


Update (9/10/2010)
In the Benefit entry, replace the first sentence with the following sentence: “When you use the aid another, aid attack, or aid defense action, you can target up to two allies with that action.” Delete the second sentence.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 145.
